original: @khya@#/_/sku gdung las kyi 'phreng ba/

analyzed: om badzra ku sha mi ta u pa da/_si myag a ri te/_i tra ba la ag t+ya/_ma ga

analyzed: pa ri bu ra rnam phyi ti ku ru swa ha/_zhes rgyu'i chos rdzogs par byin gyis brlab bo//

original: 'phro ba ltar byas la/_/om badzra dz+nya na ban tsha ka ya gu na gar khang /_pu mi ta/
analyzed: 'phro ba ltar byas la/_/om badzra dz+nya na ban tsha ka ya gu na gar khang /_pu mi ta/
translated: Om vajra jñāna ban tsakaya guna gar khang pu mi ta🔽Śītaṃ kuru svāhā

original: shi ti na ku ru swa ha/_dz+nya na bag sa man ta/_a mo ki sa man ta/_a mo ka ya
analyzed: shi ti na ku ru swa ha/_dz+nya na bag sa man ta/_a mo ki sa man ta/_a mo ka ya
translated: Jñāna bak saṃmanta amo ki saṃmanta amoka🔽ya svāhā.

original: swa ha/_zhes sku dang ye shes su gsal ba las/_'bras bu'i chos thams cad
analyzed: swa ha/_zhes sku dang ye shes su gsal ba las/_'bras bu'i chos thams cad
translated: From the clarity of the kāya and pristine consciousness, imagine that all resultant qualities are complete.

original: rdzogs par bsam mo/_/de la rang bzhin gnas pa yang /_/spyan las byas pa
analyzed: rdzogs par bsam mo/_/de la rang bzhin gnas pa yang /_/spyan las byas pa

analyzed: brgya rtsha brgyad/_/stong khri 'bum sogs 'bad byas la/_/rab gnas sbyin sreg

original: rgyas par sbyar/_/yi dam nar ma'i sbyor ba la/_/rang bzhin mchod rten lhar
analyzed: rgyas par sbyar/_/yi dam nar ma'i sbyor ba la/_/rang bzhin mchod rten lhar

analyzed: bcas pas/_/snyan dbab spyan drang bstim brtan pas/_/sngon bzhin byas la
translated: Then, as before, with the “descent of the nectar” and the invocation, absorption, and stabilization,🔽make the offering with the mudra of homage.

original: phyag gis mchod/_//a ti pra ti pu ho yis/_/spyi bral phyag dang lan rdzogs bya'o/
analyzed: phyag gis mchod/_//a ti pra ti pu ho yis/_/spyi bral phyag dang lan rdzogs bya'o/

original: kun bzangs mchod pa nam mkha'i mdzod/_/sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod par bya'o//🔽gzeng zhal rgyan ldan a ha ras/_/phyag dang zhal bsil gsol bar bya/_/lha mo

translated: Make the offering of the Samantabhadra offering cloud and the offering with mantra and mudra.🔽  With the face ornament and “aha ra,” perform the homage and the rinsing of the mouth.

original: bzhi'i sngags phyag rgyas/_/spyan shangs sku la thim par bya/_/om 'jig rten brtan
analyzed: bzhi'i sngags phyag rgyas/_/spyan shangs sku la thim par bya/_/om 'jig rten brtan
translated: With the mantra and mudra of the four goddesses, dissolve the eyes, the nose, and the body.🔽  Om. Although all the stable and moving things of the world

original: g.yo thams cad la/_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyang /_/bzung 'dzin
analyzed: g.yo thams cad la/_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyang /_/bzung 'dzin
translated: are the natural mandala,🔽they are obscured by the noose of the concepts of grasping and fixation

original: rnam rtog zhags pa yis/_/rang gis bsgribs shing bdag tu bcings/_/kun gyis
analyzed: rnam rtog zhags pa yis/_/rang gis bsgribs shing bdag tu bcings/_/kun gyis
translated: and are bound by the self.🔽  In order to realize the true nature,

original: yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir/_/de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan/_/yang
analyzed: yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir/_/de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan/_/yang
translated: the reflection of the dharmakaya is shown.🔽  The meaning of the complete perfection of the true nature

original: dag thams cad rdzogs pa'i don/_/sna tshhogs 'phrin las rnam par rol/_/don gyi
analyzed: dag thams cad rdzogs pa'i don/_/sna tshhogs 'phrin las rnam par rol/_/don gyi

original: snying po mchog gnas dang /_/byang chub chos rnams rab tu rdzogs/_/'jig rten
analyzed: snying po mchog gnas dang /_/byang chub chos rnams rab tu rdzogs/_/'jig rten
translated: The supreme essence abides, and the qualities of enlightenment are perfected,🔽and the supreme wheel of the world is turned.🔽AHO!

original: gtsho mchog rab tu bskor/_/a ho/_ho chos sku'i yon tan lhun gyis grub pa yi/_/
analyzed: gtsho mchog rab tu bskor/_/a ho/_ho chos sku'i yon tan lhun gyis grub pa yi/_/
translated: The qualities of the dharmakāya are spontaneously present,🔽and the essence of the teachings is gathered like a beehive.

original: thal sbyar bo de ka ya bag_/tshi ta ti sta badzra stan/_/bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don🔽gyi phyir/_/'khor lo ngang mchu'i tshhul bzhin du/_/bka' yi bcud bsdus bsod
analyzed: thal sbyar bo de ka ya bag_/tshi ta ti sta badzra stan/_/bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don gyi phyir/_/'khor lo ngang mchu'i tshhul bzhin du/_/bka' yi bcud bsdus bsod
translated: For the sake of both self and other,🔽may the nectar of the teachings be gathered,🔽and through the merit of this, may infinite beings be manifestly enlightened.
